return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-content",children:[showImporter&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginBottom:'20px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CSVImporter,{onDataImported:handleDataImported})}),renderMainContent()]})]});}export default App;
